body_html:
@wfs I think this is just a missing step in the documentation. Can you try running this install command (from the Ubuntu section earlier in the readme):

sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip

If that works, let me know and I'll update the docs. I'm guessing the problem was that I already had those installed on my Pi's, so I didn't see the problem there.
